name: Link Designer – Free Link Designer Plugin for WordPress
author: 8Degree Themes

sections.description:
Homepage | Demo | Documentation | Support

Link Designer Lite – Free Link Designer Plugin for WordPress

Link Designer Lite is a free WordPress plugin that allows you to style up your links with beautiful CSS3 effects. Packed with 12 cool animation templates, you can design your site’s link buttons or hyperlinks of any post in an elegant and eye catching fashion.

It is an easy to use plugin that comes with shortcode generators that generates shortcodes for each of the existing as well as newly added links. Besides, the plugin comes with different customization possibilities to configure your site’s link as per your preference. It contains unlimited color options for adding/editing your site’s link background color, typography options for editing the link text fonts, font size and text transformation and many more.

Feature List

We have listed all the options available in the plugin.

  • 12 Beautifully Designed Cool Animation Templates
  • Shortcode Generator
  • Unlimited Color Scheme
  • Selected Typography Options
  • Option to Set the Alignment of your Link Text
  • Set the Link Target (New Tab or Same Page)
  • Option to Make your Link Downloadable

More Resources

Themes Compatible With Our Plugin :
Link Designer Lite works best with every WordPress theme. Its even more remarkable when used with popular themes of ours such as Hamza Pro and The100.

AND IF THIS PLUGIN HAS IMPRESSED YOU, THEN YOU WOULD ENJOY OUR OTHER PROJECTS TOO. DO CHECK THESE OUT :

sections.installation:
1. Unzip [plugin].zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/link-designer-lite
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  4. To add a custom link, go to any post/page and link on the Link Designer button besides the Add media button
sections.changelog:

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip [plugin].zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/link-designer-lite
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  4. To add a custom link, go to any post/page and link on the Link Designer button besides the Add media button
